text: Kamaghɨn, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, Israelian God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkeme: Ia Judaba ko Jerusalemia, ia oragh! Kɨ fomɨra akam ia mɨkɨni, ezɨ ia kuariba arigha akar kam barazir puvatɨ. Kɨ ian diazɨ, ia nan dɨmdiam ikarazir puvatɨ. Bizir kam bangɨn, kɨ damuasa mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, kɨ bizir kuraba bar adar amutɨ da ia bativam.”
